full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Launching Ramp Construction and Installation, Upper Whitehead, NS

## Overview

* Contractor: Department of Fisheries and Oceans 
* Title: Launching Ramp Construction and Installation, Upper Whitehead, NS
* Tender Reference: cb-115-38906117
* Notice Publication Date: 2023-10-11
* Expiration Date: 2023-10-25T14:00:00
* Estimated Contract Value: [Not Specified]

## Description

Construction and installation of a launching ramp at Upper Whitehead, NS, including:

* Removal, storage, and reuse of existing riprap
* Core stone supply and placement
* Granular sub-base supply and placement
* Riprap supply and placement in a singular layer and up to 1100mm thick
* Salvage and reuse riprap material for the new launch ramp and service area
* Installation of precast and cast-in-place sections for the launching ramp
* Supply and placement of core stone, granular base, and riprap stone for the new service area

## Requirements

* Contractors must have the necessary expertise and experience for this project
* Contractors must complete the Annex E form, if they are an Indigenous Company and wish to be considered for a Conditional Set-Aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)

## Attachment

* Annex C: Specifications, available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21874/annex-c---30005020---specs.pdf
* Annex D: Drawings, available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21874/annex-d---30005020---drawings.pdf
* Invitation to Tender, available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21874/30005020--invitation-to-tender_final.pdf

## Contact

* Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Dina Al-Eryani, dina.al-eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, 506282-2340

Proposals must be submitted to this contact by the Expiration Date listed above. The government will not consider any bids received after the expiration date.  Reply to this email for any clarifications.  Contact for inquiries Reply to this email for any clarifications.  Contact for inquiries.
